description: Motorsport commentator Clive McNeil died when he crashed into an embankment, says the Manx coroner.
title: Clive McNeil died from 'multiple injuries' after Isle of Man TT course crash
title_page: Clive McNeil died from 'multiple injuries' after Isle of Man TT course crash - BBC News
maintext: An inquest has been opened into the death of a motorsport commentator and DJ who crashed his motorbike while riding on the Isle of Man's TT course.
